    • Method Detail

      • updatePeakThreadCount

        static void updatePeakThreadCount(int liveThreadCount,
                                  int numActiveSystemThreads)
        Updates the current peak thread count.

        Note: this must be uninterruptible because it's called from the RVMThread.start() and that method must not have yieldpoints.

        Parameters:
        liveThreadCount - the current count of live threads
        numActiveSystemThreads - the current count of live system threads

      • getPeakThreadCount

        public static int getPeakThreadCount()

      • increaseStartedThreadCount

        static void increaseStartedThreadCount()
        Increases the number of started threads

        Note: this must be uninterruptible because it's called from the RVMThread.start() and that method must not have yieldpoints.

      • isInNative

        public static boolean isInNative(RVMThread t)
        Checks whether the thread is in native according to JMX.
        Parameters:
        t - a thread
        Returns:
        whether the thread is executing JNI code

      • isSuspended

        public static boolean isSuspended(RVMThread t)
        Checks whether the thread is currently suspended according to JMX.
        Parameters:
        t - a thread
        Returns:
        whether Thread.suspend() was called on the thread
